Gene expression data¶

This page contains descriptions and examples to load gene expression data!

Fetch gene expression data¶

The ENGMA TOOLBOX provides microarray expression data obtained from the Allen Human Brain Atlas. Following the examples below, we can fetch microarray expression data and extract GWAS-implicated disease risk genes.

Note

The Allen Human Brain Atlas microarray expression data loaded as part of the ENIGMA TOOLBOX was originally fetched from the abagen toolbox using the abagen.get_expression_data() command, using data from all donors. We then re-organized the rows (corresponding to region labels) to match the order used in ENIGMA-derived data matrices!

Note

Please also note that two regions (right frontal pole and right temporal pole) in the Desikan-Killiany atlas were not matched to any tissue sample and thus are filled with NaN values in the data matrix.

Matlab

>>> ...
